movies.title: Tih Minh
movies.plot: Jacques d'Athys, a French adventurer, returns to his home in Nice after an expedition to Indochina where he has picked up a Eurasian fiancée and a book that, unbeknownst to him, contains a coded message revealing the whereabouts of both secret treasures and sensitive government intelligence. This makes him the target of foreign spies, including a Marquise of mysterious Latin origin, a Hindu hypnotist and an evil German doctor, who will stop at nothing to obtain the book.
movies.simplePlot: Jacques d'Athys, a French adventurer, returns to his home in Nice after an expedition to Indochina where he has picked up a Eurasian fiancée and a book that, unbeknownst to him, contains a ...

biography.bio: Mary Harald was born in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. She is an actress, known for Tih Minh (1918), Les mains flétries (1920) and Du rire aux larmes (1917).
biography.name: Mary Harald

biography.bio: René Cresté was born on December 5, 1881 in Paris, France. He was an actor and director, known for Judex (1916), Vendémiaire (1918) and Tih Minh (1918). He died on November 30, 1922 in Paris.
biography.name: René Cresté

biography.bio: Georges Biscot was born on September 15, 1886 in Courbevoie, Seine [now Hauts-de-Seine], France as Gaston Georges Bouzac. He was an actor, known for Biscot se trompe d'étage (1916), Séraphin ou les jambes nues (1921) and Gustave est médium (1921). He died on December 18, 1944 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Georges Biscot

biography.bio: Édouard Mathé was born in 1886 in Australia. He was an actor, known for Les vampires (1915), Judex (1916) and Les vampires: La tête coupée (1915). He died in 1934 in Brussels, Belgium.
biography.name: Édouard Mathé

biography.bio: Louis Leubas was born in 1870 in France. He was an actor, known for The Vampires: Satanas (1916), The Vampires: The Thunder Master (1916) and L'enfant de Paris (1913). He died on August 29, 1932 in Digne-les-Bains, Alpes-de-Haute-Provence, France.
biography.name: Louis Leubas

biography.bio: Gaston Michel was born in 1856 in France. He was an actor, known for Judex (1916), L'amoureuse aventure (1914) and Barrabas (1919). He died on November 15, 1921 in Lisbon, Portugal.
biography.name: Gaston Michel

biography.bio: Marcel Marquet is an actor, known for Nobility (1913), Tih Minh (1918) and L'argent ne fait pas le bonheur (1913).
biography.name: Marcel Marquet

biography.bio: Émile André was an actor and assistant director, known for L'angelus de la victoire (1916), Le feu au couvent (1911) and L'anniversaire de Mademoiselle Félicité (1911). He died in 1924 in France.
biography.name: Émile André

biography.bio: Georgette Faraboni is an actress, known for La faute d'une autre (1910), L'oeuvre accomplie (1910) and Le journal d'une orpheline (1910).
biography.name: Georgette Faraboni

biography.bio: Jeanne Rollette, French actress born around the early 1900's, was a silent drama and comedy performer, often playing character roles and occasionally starring role in at least 16 movies, first appeared in 'Vendemiaire' under the direction of Louis Feuillade and starring Rene Creste for the Gaumont in 1918, she's perhaps best remembered in Paul Barlatier's 'La course a l'amour' co-starring Edouard Mathe at the Laurea Film Co in 1924, retired from the screen after Louis Mercanton's 'Les deux gosses' starring Carlyle Blackwell at the Phocea Film Company late in 1924.
biography.name: Jeanne Rollette

biography.bio: Lugane was born as Georgette Lagneau. She is an actress, known for Vendémiaire (1918), Tih Minh (1918) and Barrabas (1919).
biography.name: Lugane

biography.bio: Adeline de La Croix is an actress, known for Une vieille marquise très riche (1924), Le scandale (1923) and Vendémiaire (1918).
biography.name: Adeline de La Croix
